pages.text: The $(item)Quarry$() uses Zaps to $(major)mine an area$().$(br2)By default, the Quarry mines in a 7x7 area, all the way down to Bedrock.$(br2)Mined items will be collected into the Quarry's inventory.$(br2)To prevent lag, Ex-Fluids will be placed around fluids to prevent them from flowing.
It costs a little over 150âš¡ to mine each block.$(br2)Without $(l:ftbic:items/upgrades)upgrades$(), it accepts only up to HV current.
By default, the Quarry only mines a 7x7 area. You can increase this using $(item)Landmarks$().$(br2)Place up to 3 Landmarks to set the boundary, and place the Quarry so it's inline with all of them.
